text: A bulmakaun apuriba ko, bulmakaun igiar mɨkarziba sara itiba ko, sipsipɨn avɨribav suegha ofa gami. Egha nɨn otariba ko ofa gamir gumazim Abiatar ko mɨdorozir gumazibar faragha zuir gumazim Joap, a me bagha akaba amangizɨ me ghue. Egha nɨn ingangarir gumazim Solomon, an a bagh akatam amadazir puvatɨ.
